entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023
